languages.text: "Род Зауэрбэк распорядился о передаче в ваше личное распоряжение несколько полков отлично тренированных слуг Императора. Каждый из них также является почетной гвардией для святых реликвий, что займут свое место в вашем трюме..." {n}Клеменциа умолкает, изумленно глядя в инфопластину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Род Зауэрбек распорядился о передаче в ваше личное распоряжение несколько полков отлично тренированных слуг Императора. Каждый из них также является почетной гвардией для святых реликвий, что займут свое место в вашем трюме..." {n}Клеменциа умолкает, изумленно глядя в инфопластину.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « La maison Sauerback a fait en sorte que plusieurs régiments de serviteurs de l'Empereur hautement qualifiés soient transférés sous votre commandement. Chacun d'entre eux servira également de garde d'honneur pour les reliques sacrées qui ne manqueront pas de trouver leur place légitime dans les soutes de votre croiseur stellaire... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et regarde sa plaque de données d'un air surpris.{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La maison Sauerback a fait en sorte que plusieurs régiments de serviteurs de l'Empereur hautement qualifiés soient transférés sous votre commandement. Chacun d'entre eux servira également de garde d'honneur pour les reliques sacrées qui ne manqueront pas de trouver leur place légitime dans les soutes de votre croiseur stellaire... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et regarde sa plaque de données d'un air surpris.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “苏尔贝克家族安排了几支训练有素的侍从队伍，这些侍从将会移交给您亲自指挥。每支队伍都负责守护一件神圣遗物，这些神圣遗物会在您的虚空舰上发挥作用……”{n}她停了下来，惊讶地盯着她的数据板。{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克家族安排了几支训练有素的侍从队伍，这些侍从将会移交给您亲自指挥。每支队伍都负责守护一件神圣遗物，这些神圣遗物会在您的虚空舰上发挥作用……”{n}她停了下来，惊讶地盯着她的数据板。{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック家は、熟練した訓練を受けた皇帝の従者たちが、あなたの指揮下に移るよう手配しました。彼らはあなたのヴォイドシップの貨物室に保管されている聖遺物を守る近衛兵としての役割も果たすでしょう…」{n}彼女は立ち止まり、驚いてデータスレートを見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック家は、熟練した訓練を受けた皇帝の従者たちが、あなたの指揮下に移るよう手配しました。彼らはあなたのヴォイドシップの貨物室に保管されている聖遺物を守る近衛兵としての役割も果たすでしょう…」{n}彼女は立ち止まり、驚いてデータスレートを見つめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Haus Sauerback hat veranlasst, dass mehrere Regimenter bestens ausgebildeter Diener des Imperators unter Ihr persönliches Kommando gestellt werden. Jedes Regiment wird auch als Ehrengarde für die heiligen Relikte fungieren und im Frachtraum Eures persönlichen Raumschiffs ihren rechtmäßigen Platz einnehmen ..." {n}Sie hält inne und blickt erstaunt ihren Datablock an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haus Sauerback hat veranlasst, dass mehrere Regimenter bestens ausgebildeter Diener des Imperators unter Ihr persönliches Kommando gestellt werden. Jedes Regiment wird auch als Ehrengarde für die heiligen Relikte fungieren und im Frachtraum Eures persönlichen Raumschiffs ihren rechtmäßigen Platz einnehmen ..." {n}Sie hält inne und blickt erstaunt ihren Datablock an.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «La casa Sauerback ha dispuesto que varios regimientos de élite de siervos del Emperador sean transferidos a su mando personal. Cada uno de ellos servirá asimismo como guardia de honor de las sagradas reliquias que habrán de ocupar el lugar que les corresponde en la bodega de su nave del vacío...». {n}La canciller hace una pausa, contemplando su tablilla de datos con expresión de sorpresa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La casa Sauerback ha dispuesto que varios regimientos de élite de siervos del Emperador sean transferidos a su mando personal. Cada uno de ellos servirá asimismo como guardia de honor de las sagradas reliquias que habrán de ocupar el lugar que les corresponde en la bodega de su nave del vacío...». {n}La canciller hace una pausa, contemplando su tablilla de datos con expresión de sorpresa.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanesi, İmparator'un uzman eğitim görmüş hizmetkârlarından oluşan birkaç alay ayarlayıp kişisel komutanıza verdi. Her biri, şahsi uçsuz geminizdeki mahzendeki ait olduğu yere yerleştirilen kutsal yadigârların onursal koruyucuları olarak hizmet edecek." {n}Duraksayıp databelasına şaşkınlıkla bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has arranged for several regiments of expertly trained servants of the Emperor to be transferred to your personal command. Each of them will also serve as an honour guard for the holy relics that are to find their rightful place in the hold of your personal voidship..." {n}She stops, staring at her data-slate in surprise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback Hanesi, İmparator'un uzman eğitim görmüş hizmetkârlarından oluşan birkaç alay ayarlayarak, onları kişisel komutanıza transfer etti. Her biri kişisel uçsuz geminizdeki mahzendeki ait olduğu yere yerleştirilen kutsal yadigârların onursal koruyucuları olarak hizmet edecekler." {n}Duraksıyor ve databelasına şaşkınlıkla bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Clemence
